title: 我装了7.1.16版的建筑，然后游戏登不上了
author: 无知的火把
txt_content:
登陆进去就说
Forge Mod Loader has found a problem with your minecraft installation
The mods and versions listed below could not be found
Forge:minimum version required is 10.13.2.1236
The fill 'ForgeModLoader-client-0.log'contains more information

replies.author: 梓
replies.txt_content:
foege版本过低  最低需求达到10.13.2.1236
forge安装器下载http://files.minecraftforge.net/

replies.author: 无知的火把
replies.txt_content:
逗比桃 发表于 2016-5-15 02:38
foege版本过低  最低需求达到10.13.2.1236
forge安装器下载http://files.minecraftforge.net/ ...
点哪里下载？

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
1.7.10 Forge最新版 10.13.4.1558 
http://files.minecraftforge.net/ ... .7.10-installer.jar
你如果一定要指定最低版本的话（10.13.2.1236）点下面这个连接
http://files.minecraftforge.net/ ... .7.10-installer.jar
